snippet.title: Hauntsfield 2.0 Trailer!
snippet.description:
Where have I been, you ask? THIS is where I've been!

I did an entire overhaul of my little Halloween RPG from last year. Playable for free on PC, mac and smartphones right in your browser, plus a .gb ROM file is available for playing on an actual Game Boy.

PLAY THE GAME FOR FREE: https://alliemackie.itch.io/hauntsfield
Changelog: https://alliemackie.itch.io/hauntsfield/devlog/441458/hauntsfield-20-is-launched

I created the original Hauntsfield last year (October 2021) as part of a three-week personal game jam. While I'm really proud of the end result, the game was rushed in some places, and there were a few bits I really wanted to revisit. Then in 2022, Chris Maltby released GB Studio 3.0 which gave me a whack of new features to make this game even better, so I just had to re-visit it for 2022!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

TWITTER: https://twitter.com/alliemackie
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/alliemackie/

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
TOOLS:

Game Development:
GB Studio 3.0 - gbstudio.dev
Aseprite - https://www.aseprite.org/
Tiled - https://www.mapeditor.org/

Trailer video:
OBS Studio
Adobe Premiere Pro

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
MUSIC:

https://tiptoptomcat.itch.io/
